===Companions===
[[Playable Characters]] (with the exception of [[Traveler]]), as well as [[Paimon]] can be invited into the Serenitea Pot after obtaining them as a character and completing the World Quest [[Idle Teapot Talk]]. They each have 300 Adeptal Energy and use 1200 load, with the exception of Paimon, who uses 1500 load.
